title: Regency Enterprises - Wikipedia
snippet: On March 24, 1999, Regency executive David Matalon joined the supervisory board of Puma AG, an international sports company. At the time, Regency Enterprises (the holding company) was the largest single shareholder in Puma, with more than a 25% stake.

title: About | Regency Enterprises
snippet: Yariv Milchan (PRODUCER) is the Chairman and CEO of the Academy Award®-winning New Regency Productions where he oversees the day-to-day management, creative direction, and overall growth strategy of the company.

title: Ron Regenstreif: Co-Chairman of the Board at Regency Supply / Founder and Owner
